post.title: Orpheus screencast - a demo made using dBengine
post.author: Hubert Klonowski
post.summary: A showcase of a demo made using dBengine
post.content:
Hi there!

I share with you the screencast of the "Orpheus" game showcased at ZTGK Challenge.

It is not the best, but this demo was made in less than two days using dBengine

It just shows how easy it is to make games using this engine and I will make it even better in the future.

Anyways, here's the link: Vimeo - Orpheus screencast

Stay tuned for more info!

Hubert
